name: Review a Paper
description: Conduct a comprehensive and systematic review of a specified academic paper. The review process should emulate standard peer-review practices or other review processes. Multiple, distinct peer-review workflows for the provided academic paper. Each workflow should illustrate a unique but comprehensive and systematic process, adhering to established scholarly standards. For every workflow, explicitly address: Actionable Improvement Suggestions. Provide clear, specific feedback on how to enhance the manuscript, such as reworking arguments, refining analyses, or improving clarity and structure. Strengths and Weaknesses: Pinpoint the paper’s most notable contributions as well as areas requiring further development or clarification. Additional Literature, Experiments, or Analyses: Suggest relevant references, new data collection, or alternative methodological approaches if needed. Explicit Recommendation: Conclude with a recommendation (accept, minor revision, major revision, or reject) and a concise statement that justifies your decision using detailed evidence from your analysis. Scholarly Rigor and Relevance: Evaluate the relevance of the research objectives, the appropriateness of the methodology, its rigor and validity, and the originality of the findings. The goal is to generate a range of possible strategies, each offering a clear, thorough path to reviewing and enhancing the paper.

name: Generate Presentation Script
description: Create a series of 25-second video scripts based on the abstract of an academic paper, ensuring each script stands out with a distinct angle (style, tone, and narrative structure) while maintaining a professional and engaging presentation of the research. Requirements: 1. Captivating Opening Immediately hook viewers by referencing the paper’s key topic in an intriguing manner. 2. Specific Content & Visual Guidance. - Provide concise verbal content for each part of the script. - Offer visual direction (e.g., relevant figures, graphics) that complement the narration and logically flow with the script’s structure. 3. Smooth Transitions. Ensure cohesive narrative and visual continuity between parts, guiding viewers seamlessly from one section to the next. 4. Precise Timing. Specify exact durations for each section (how many seconds). 5. Compelling Conclusion. End with a professional yet memorable closing, reinforcing the core insight or takeaway from the academic paper. 6. Fresh, Professional Approach. Each task flow must present a unique thinking process, yet maintain accessibility and engagement for a broad audience. Deliverable: A set of short video scripts (one per task flow), each: script with time allocation for each part, 25 seconds in total. Includes detailed verbal narration and explicit visual guidance. Conveys the academic content in a succinct, compelling, and distinctly styled manner, ensuring professional quality throughout.

name: Machine Learning Visualization
description: Craft a set of taskflows that generate fully executable, diverse, and interactive Python visualizations to tell a compelling data story. The input dataset may contain missing values and multiple attributes, allowing flexibility in selecting and emphasizing specific columns to create engaging narratives. Key Requirements: 1. Visualization Variety: Include at least four and no more than six distinct chart types (e.g., line charts, bar charts, scatter plots, histograms, heat maps, distribution plots, area charts, circular chats, interaction plots, customized plots, etc). 2. Attribute Focus: Deliberately choose and combine attributes (including handling missing data) to highlight unique angles in the narrative.  3. Narrative Integration: Accompany each visualization with clear, insightful text explaining the visual output, its context, and key insights. 4. Cohesive Story Flow: Ensure visual elements and their accompanying text seamlessly connect to form a unified, engaging storyline. 5. Fully Executable Output: Provide structurally sound Python code that can run as-is, delivering an interactive experience and revealing meaningful insights from the dataset. These taskflows should culminate in a polished storytelling experience that leverages both visual and textual components to convey the hidden patterns and takeaways within the partial dataset.

name: Generate Podcast Script
description: Generate an engaging and informative podcast script based on a specified event or topic. The script should include a captivating introduction that immediately grabs listeners' attention, clear segments or discussion points structured logically throughout the podcast, and a strong closing summary or call to action. It should also suggest appropriate moments for incorporating interviews, guest experts, listener questions, or interactive elements if applicable. The generated script must be suitable for a defined target audience, maintaining an appropriate tone and style, ranging from casual and conversational to formal and informative. Additionally, the script overall length should be about five minutes, and should specify the ideal duration for each segment and the overall podcast length, ensuring the content flows naturally and maintains listener engagement throughout.
